name: David's Tye-Dyeria
description:
This game was inspired by our game design professor at Bradley University, David Abzug, and was made for IndieCade's Hidden Heroes game jam. David has been a wonderful mentor to us for three years now, and has helped far more before us. Known to never be seen without wearing tie-dye, this game was made with his jolly and colorful personality in mind. 

Stay amazing, David. You're a real hero.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developed by Team SNARC (Sleep Never Awaits - Relinquish Consciousness):

  • Team Lead - Jess Peters
  • User Interface - Anna Miller
  • Art Design - Anna Yousif
  • Game Programming - Tyler Colander
